attributes.action: Introduce Third Party insurance for all cyclists.
attributes.additional_details:
Flashing LEDs should also be banned for cyclists when riding as very distracting when driving or walking.  Especially if not angled down at the road. 
This is also a big hazard for epileptics and flash blinding drivers.
attributes.background: It's about time cyclists should be made to take out Insurance Cover to ride bicycles on the road.   If cars have to why not bikes they can cause damage too!
